thread.title: Not quite sure what the negative reviews are all about??
thread.title_full: Not quite sure what the negative reviews are all about?? - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Salvagehuntersme2
title: Not quite sure what the negative reviews are all about??
text: I booked this hotel for my partners birthday as we wanted to be close by to shoredittch brick lane spital fields and the coolest ever bikers heaven The Bike Shed the location was simply perfect The staff are very friendly and attentive without being intrusive and our room was exceptionally clean as for the bathroom it was faultless as for the bed it was like a gigantic marshmallow a perfect nights sleep. Breakfast was plentiful and a great choice I suggest saving some room as the culinary delights of the street foods nearby is not to be missed either. All in all I recommend this hotel to anyone first time in a holiday inn and certainly not my last if they are anything like is one!
